articles.description: MediaTek's AI chips, like the Dimensity 9300 and Dimensity 8300, have on-device generative AI capabilities. The Dimensity 9300 can handle Large Language Models (LLMs) with up to 33 billion parameters.
articles.content: MediaTek, at its Executive Summit 2023, unveiled plans to introduce AI-powered chips, a move aimed at integrating generative AI into smartphones. This echoes the industry trend, as demonstrated by th… [+2437 chars]

articles.author: Sucharita Ganguly, Siddharth Suvarna
articles.title: Vivo S18 Series Confirmed to Launch on December 14, Key Specifications Teased, Vivo TWS 3e to Follow - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Vivo S18 series is confirmed to launch in China on December 14 as a successor to the Vivo S17 lineup, which was unveiled in May this year. The upcoming series will include three models - the base Vivo S18, Vivo S18 Pro, and Vivo S18e. The Vivo TWS 3e earbuds …
